meanings.definition: Used to express admiration or astonishment.
meanings.sent1: Wow! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Wow, look at that beautiful sunset!
meanings.sent3: Wow, I can't believe how fast you can run!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, making everyone go 'wow'!
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the concert left the audience in a state of 'wow'.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Oh wow, I didn't expect to see you here!
meanings.sent2: Wow, this roller coaster is so much fun!
meanings.sent3: Wow, that was a close call with the falling vase!
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist in the movie made everyone gasp in 'wow'!
meanings.sent5: The sudden burst of confetti created a moment of 'wow' at the party.
